data.title: Jefferies
data.meta_description: Opportunity to join a team working on high visible and strategic multi-year project to support operations technology transformation. The Full stack Developer will be building a data access layer and service layer using microservices architecture that integrates with various other technologies such as ServiceNow, Database, Messaging Layer etc. The Developer role include designing, developing and delivering high-volume, low-latency applications for mission-critical systems. Candidate will be part of an agile team that follows all the SDLC best practices such as test automation, code review, deployment automation etc Responsibilities - Responsible for building a strategic technology solution for operations technology using technologies such as Angular, Java, and SQL - Design and deliver front to back technical solutions and integrate into business processes - Participate in hands on coding, code reviews, architectural decisions, and reviews - Work in an Agile Systems Developmen...
